member.name: T:MongoDB.Driver.MongoCollection`1
member.summary: Represents a MongoDB collection and the settings used to access it as well as a default document type. This class is thread-safe.
member.typeparam: The default document type of the collection.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of MongoCollection. Normally you would call one of the indexers or GetCollection methods of MongoDatabase instead.
member.param: The database that contains this collection.
The settings to use to access this collection.

member.param: The query (usually a QueryDocument or constructed using the Query builder).
member.returns: A .

member.returns: A TDefaultDocument (or null if not found).

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoCollection`1.Save(`0)
member.summary: Saves a document to this collection. The document must have an identifiable Id field. Based on the value of the Id field Save will perform either an Insert or an Update.
member.returns: A WriteConcernResult (or null if WriteConcern is disabled).

member.name: T:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase
member.summary: Represents a MongoDB database and the settings used to access it. This class is thread-safe.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.#ctor(MongoDB.Driver.MongoServer,System.String,MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabaseSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of MongoDatabase. Normally you would call one of the indexers or GetDatabase methods of MongoServer instead.
member.param: The server that contains this database.
The settings to use to access this database.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.CommandCollection
member.summary: Gets the command collection for this database.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.GridFS
member.summary: Gets the default GridFS instance for this database. The default GridFS instance uses default GridFS settings. See also GetGridFS if you need to use GridFS with custom settings.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of this database.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.Server
member.summary: Gets the server that contains this database.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.Settings
member.summary: Gets the settings being used to access this database.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a MongoCollection instance representing a collection on this database with a default document type of BsonDocument.
member.returns: An instance of MongoCollection.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.Item(System.String,MongoDB.Driver.WriteConcern)
member.summary: Gets a MongoCollection instance representing a collection on this database with a default document type of BsonDocument.
member.param: The write concern to use when accessing this collection.
member.returns: An instance of MongoCollection.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.AddUser(MongoDB.Driver.MongoUser)
member.summary: Adds a user to this database.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.CollectionExists(System.String)
member.summary: Tests whether a collection exists on this database.
member.returns: True if the collection exists.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.CreateCollection(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a collection. MongoDB creates collections automatically when they are first used, so this command is mainly here for frameworks.
member.returns: A CommandResult.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.CreateCollection(System.String,MongoDB.Driver.IMongoCollectionOptions)
member.summary: Creates a collection. MongoDB creates collections automatically when they are first used, so you only need to call this method if you want to provide non-default options.
member.param: Options for creating this collection (usually a CollectionOptionsDocument or constructed using the CollectionOptions builder).
member.returns: A CommandResult.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.Drop
member.summary: Drops a database.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.DropCollection(System.String)
member.summary: Drops a collection.
member.param: The name of the collection to drop.
member.returns: A CommandResult.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.Eval(MongoDB.Driver.EvalFlags,MongoDB.Bson.BsonJavaScript,System.Object[])
member.summary: Evaluates JavaScript code at the server.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoServer.RequestDone
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is done with a series of related operations. Instead of calling this method it is better to put the return value of RequestStart in a using statement.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoServer.RequestStart
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is about to begin a series of related operations that must all occur on the same connection. The return value of this method implements IDisposable and can be placed in a using statement (in which case RequestDone will be called automatically when leaving the using statement).
member.returns: A helper object that implements IDisposable and calls from the Dispose method.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoServer.RequestStart(MongoDB.Driver.ReadPreference)
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is about to begin a series of related operations that must all occur on the same connection. The return value of this method implements IDisposable and can be placed in a using statement (in which case RequestDone will be called automatically when leaving the using statement).
member.returns: A helper object that implements IDisposable and calls from the Dispose method.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoServer.RequestStart(MongoDB.Driver.MongoServerInstance)
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is about to begin a series of related operations that must all occur on the same connection. The return value of this method implements IDisposable and can be placed in a using statement (in which case RequestDone will be called automatically when leaving the using statement).
member.param: The server instance this request should be tied to.
member.returns: A helper object that implements IDisposable and calls from the Dispose method.
